Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to establishing certain practices relating to models
Summary: Relates to establishing unlawful discriminatory practices relating to models; requires models to be informed of what constitutes an unlawful discriminatory practice and how to file a complaint; requires modeling entities to provide adult models with educational materials regarding nutrition and eating disorders.
LawCode: Add ยง296-e, amd ยง292, Exec L; add ยง202-n, Lab L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the labor law, in relation to establishing certain practices relating to models
